```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(dlookr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
data(mtcars)
factors_auto <- mtcars %>% select_if(function(x) {all(unique(x) %in% c(0, 1, 2))}) %>% colnames()
factors_list <- c("cyl")

mtcars %>%  mutate(across(
  c(all_of(factors_auto), all_of(factors_list)), as.factor
)) -> mtcars


# Delete random values in numeric columns data frame mtcars. Result write in new data frame mtcars_ex.
mtcars_ex <- mtcars %>% mutate(across(where(is.numeric), ~ifelse(runif(n()) < 0.1, NA, .)))  
  

mtcars_ex %>% 
    plot_na_pareto()

diagnose_web_report(mtcars_ex)
eda_web_report(mtcars_ex)

```
